data.message:
Short of being bias why is it that in America today many shallow minded people choose to disrespect and single out Hispanics as the only nationality that migrates to America and u are so many people so misunderstood about What Borders which by the way are many...All nationalities for decades have entered America...Why. Do some PEOPLE choose to believe that there is only one border with a problem and one people's....
Don't hate Appreciate
